title: About Fashion Rental
subtitle: Welcome to Fashion Rental by Iti Vashistha
story: We are your premier destination for exquisite dress rentals in India. From traditional Indian wear to contemporary Western outfits, we offer a curated collection of stunning dresses for every occasion.

Founded with the vision of making fashion accessible and sustainable, Fashion Rental brings you designer wear at affordable prices. Whether itâ€™s a wedding, party, or special event, we have the perfect outfit for you.
